name: The Cover of Darkness
description:
Command an army of darkness to conquer the world of elemental creatures. 

Gameplay

Use the arrow keys to move the camera.

There are a total of 3 different types of units: Infantry, Support (ranged) and Tank.

Infantry Units deal more damage to tanks and less damage to Support Units. 

Support Units deal more damage to Infantry Units and less damage to Tank Units. 

Tank Units deal more damage to Support Units and less damage to Infantry Units.

You unlock new units after conquering a region; customise them wisely!

Credits
